about_the_game:
Gameplay.

This is an exploratory horror game.
You can open and close doors and shelves, turn light switches on and off, and inspect objects.
If you find something of interest or a change, examine it anyway.


Fear Experience

Realistic visuals, lighting, and 3D sound allow you to feel fear as you explore.
It is strongly influenced by that legendary playable teaser.
There are jumpscares and gore, but you will enjoy the quiet moments of fear and not knowing what to expect.


The Ending

There is only one ending for this game.
The estimated time to complete the game is 60 to 120 minutes.


Video Distribution Guidelines

No permission is required from any individual or corporation.
However, the following guidelines must be adhered to.

Include the words “209” and “KANEGON GAMES” in the video and distribution title.
Notify viewers of your intention to play the game at least 3 days prior to the start of the streaming.
　Added on 29/08/2024
　　　　(Any media can be used for the announcement. Three days are set aside for viewers to check the store page in advance)
Do not distribute the game with a paid plan such as a channel membership.
Agree that the producer will not be held liable for any damages resulting from playing this game.

The above is subject to change without notice.

highlighted.name: Who do you see in the mirror?
How many times do I have to repeat it?

detailed_description:
Gameplay.

This is an exploratory horror game.
You can open and close doors and shelves, turn light switches on and off, and inspect objects.
If you find something of interest or a change, examine it anyway.


Fear Experience

Realistic visuals, lighting, and 3D sound allow you to feel fear as you explore.
It is strongly influenced by that legendary playable teaser.
There are jumpscares and gore, but you will enjoy the quiet moments of fear and not knowing what to expect.


The Ending

There is only one ending for this game.
The estimated time to complete the game is 60 to 120 minutes.


Video Distribution Guidelines

No permission is required from any individual or corporation.
However, the following guidelines must be adhered to.

Include the words “209” and “KANEGON GAMES” in the video and distribution title.
Notify viewers of your intention to play the game at least 3 days prior to the start of the streaming.
　Added on 29/08/2024

Do not distribute the game with a paid plan such as a channel membership.
Agree that the producer will not be held liable for any damages resulting from playing this game.

The above is subject to change without notice.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

steam_germany.descriptors:
Drastische Gewalt
Sexuelle Andeutungen
Alkohol / Tabak

short_description: You are locked in a quiet apartment room. The only way out of the tightly closed door is to get to the truth of the case. Overcome your fear and try to escape.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
